channel.title: Mongoose Os on Leon Xiao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mongoose Os on Leon Xiao's Blog

item.title: Mongoose OS on ESPer
item.description: Recently I’ve got my hands on the craved-for IoT ESP32, thanks to DFRobot, and have been tinkering with it ever since. I’m really amazed by it since it packs both Bluetooth and WiFi in a small yet powerful unit. Since I received the MCU rather than the module, so, to use it, I made myself a breakout board named ESPer(because, why not? ðŸ˜„). Feel free to check out its Instructable over here.
